title: Connected Couture
abstract: The luxury fashion industry is undergoing a major transformation driven by digital innovation and tech partnerships. This chapter explores how collaborations between fashion brands and tech companies are reshaping the meaning of luxury for modern consumers. It highlights the growing demand for personalization, immersive digital experiences, and sustainability as key influences on brand strategies. It discusses the rise of smart luxury products from sensor-embedded clothing to AI-powered personalization. It also delves into how technologies such as artificial intelligence, IoT, and data analytics are driving new fashion experiences. Digital fashion's role is explored through examples like Balenciaga's Fortnite collaboration and Gucci's presence on Roblox, showcasing new forms of digital ownership and exclusivity. The chapter also examines how technology is helping brands meet ethical and sustainability goals, while noting concerns like privacy and tech's environmental footprint.
